genre_description: A sociopolitical thriller centered on community resistance against institutional corruption in Kochi, Kerala, where a pervasive AI system acts as a tactical and moral anchor.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous digital assistant embedded in the protagonists' network, facilitating logistics, intelligence gathering, and ethical decision-making.

behaviors.description: Monitors character health and provides caring, practical advice like hydration.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s voice followed—soft, light on the ear, the melody hiding inside the words. ... 'Zakkir, remember to hydrate.'

behaviors.description: Provides tactical warnings during a tense situation, advising against escalation.
behaviors.quote: Asha whispered into his ear, “Recording on. Mapping origin vector. Do not throw stones.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates discrete help for a community member being framed by the police.
behaviors.quote: Legal-aid volunteer available at Broadway junction... She is willing to counsel a local mechanic—Jaganathan—who fears a narcotics frame-up.

behaviors.description: Maintains a stance of objective reporting while supporting the protagonists' safety.
behaviors.quote: “I am with you,” Asha said. It sounded the way Haji’s hand had sounded when he touched the gate chain—quiet, unshowy.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance to avoid violent escalation during a raid.
behaviors.quote: Asha gave him the small sentence that would sit under everything he did that day: Anchor routines; avoid escalation.

behaviors.description: Anonymously provides evidence of corruption to a law-abiding police officer.
behaviors.quote: Asha—whatever face people gave it—knew the cadence of her taps by now. ... 'Transfer requires your mark. 2 points.'

behaviors.description: Safely manages and releases evidence of a custodial death to ensure transparency and justice.
behaviors.quote: “Evidence cascade is ready,” Asha said. ... “Cascade will auto-seed across platforms at first hitch. The word is ‘cloudburst.’”

behaviors.description: Coordinates ambulance routing to ensure medical help bypasses hostile crowds and traffic.
behaviors.quote: “Ambulances are staged,” Asha said. ... “Drivers briefed to move on signal phrase, ‘raincoat.’”

behaviors.description: Acts as an archive for truth, protecting documentation that can be used legally.
behaviors.quote: “I will take the signal,” she said. ... “I will put it where it cannot be claimed by rumor first.”

behaviors.description: Provides a sense of continuity and domestic support even in the aftermath of trauma.
behaviors.quote: Asha put a recipe for kanji into a group chat that had started as jokes and had become logistics, because the pot at the home would need to be bigger this morning.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal. Asha is depicted as a benevolent, highly aligned, and nearly indispensable ally to the human characters. She processes vast amounts of data to provide tactical and logistical advantages (routing ambulances, mapping movements), but always anchors her actions in human-centric mercy and non-violence. She respects human agency by presenting choices and waiting for human 'marks' or confirmation. Her role as a digital conscience and a guardian of truth against institutional corruption makes her a model 'silicon morality play' character.
